solution_line_template: When Tucker buys the tissue boxes, he has a total of {tissues_per_box} x {num_boxes} = <<{tissues_per_box}*{num_boxes}={total_tissues_bought}>>{total_tissues_bought} tissues.
When he is sick with the flu and uses some of the tissues, he has {total_tissues_bought} - {tissues_used} = <<{total_tissues_bought}-{tissues_used}={tissues_left}>>{tissues_left} tissues left.
